data.title: Review: ‘En agosto nos vemos’ tarnishes Gabriel Garcia Marquez’s legacy
data.meta_description: This year marks the 10th anniversary of the death of Gabriel Garcia Marquez, who received an honorary doctorate of letters from Columbia in 1971 and won the 1982 Nobel Prize in literature for his magnum opus, “One Hundred Years of Solitude.” Marquez left a strong portfolio of works behind, making many wonder if he had left anything for publication when he passed.
